name: CLSProgressReportingCapability
desc: A progress reporting capability supported by a context.

items.name: init(kind: CLSProgressReportingCapability.Kind, details: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new progress reporting capability of the given type with a descriptive string.

items.name: var details: String?
items.desc: A description of the capability presented to teachers.

items.name: var kind: CLSProgressReportingCapability.Kind
items.desc: The kind of progress reporting capability.

items.name: enum CLSProgressReportingCapability.Kind
items.desc: The available kinds of progress reporting that a context can perform.
